description:
I had just received the Solana Seeker phone. Knowing the 1st Solana was pre-installed with NFTs, Bonk tokens etc I stupidly thought the same would be on the new Seeker phone. So when I start the phone up a JUP token airdrop popped up and pressed it. That gave access to my 'staking' account. So much SOL, SUI, stash was gone. I think they got to all my accounts when I tried to install my Phantom wallet using my Seed phrase. After that all my wallets were emptied. So I don't know if the hackers got into one wallet they got access to all the wallets before I put my Seed phrase in? Or they copied the seed phrase when I was trying to install it? Can anyone enlighten me?

I had just received the Solana Seeker phone. Knowing the 1st Solana was pre-installed with NFTs, Bonk tokens etc I stupidly thought the same would be on the new Seeker phone. So when I start the phone up a JUP token airdrop popped up and pressed it. That gave access to my 'staking' account. So much SOL, SUI, stash was gone.

I think they got to all my accounts when I tried to install my Phantom wallet using my Seed phrase. After that all my wallets were emptied. So I don't know if the hackers got into one wallet they got access to all the wallets before I put my Seed phrase in? Or they copied the seed phrase when I was trying to install it?

Can anyone enlighten me?

Amount lost

52513.88 USD
